data.title: Mehr News Agency
data.text:
VIDEO: Muharram mawkibs serving mourners in Fuman city

TEHRAN, Jul. 15 (MNA) – A group of youth in Fuman city in Gilan province set up mawkibs (stations) on the night of Tasu'a to serve Imam Hussein (AS) mourners.

VIDEO: Beautiful scenes of wildlife in Amlash

TEHRAN, May 11 (MNA) – Unique examples of rare and world-class wildlife have been registered in Amlash, Gilan Province, northern Iran, the head of the city's Department of Environment said.

TEHRAN, Apr. 19 (MNA) – The first edition of horse-racing in Gilan province was held on the beach of Bandar Anzali.

VIDEO: Inauguration ceremony of Qazvin-Rasht freeway

TEHRAN, Mar. 11 (MNA) – The inauguration ceremony of the Qazvin-Rasht freeway was performed in the presence of Vice President for Executive Affairs Mohsen Mansouri, the Minister of Roads and Urban Development, and a group of Gilan province officials.

Beach sambo competitions in Gilan province

TEHRAN, Sep. 09 (MNA) – The first edition of the beach sambo competitions was held in Bandar Anzali, Gilan province, northern Iran, with the participation of 45 fighters from 14 provinces of the country.

Members of major Baha'i spy ring detained in northern Iran

TEHRAN, Jul. 25 (MNA) – Iranian IRGC and intelligence forces said in a joint statement Tuesday that they have arrested the members of a key Baha'i group who were linked with a Zionist regime's center in the north of the country in Gilan Province.

Iranian long-standing Alambandan ritual in Muharram
